content: यजुस् {%<ab>n.</ab>%} [यज्-इन्] {@--1@} A sacrificial prayer or formula, {@--2@} A text of the Yajurveda, or the body of sacred {%mantras%} in prose muttered at sacrifices; वृत्तगीतिवर्जितत्वेन प्रश्लिष्टपठिता मंत्रा यजूंषि <ls>Sāyaṇa</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> मंत्र {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of the Yajurveda. {@--4@} <ab>Ved.</ab> Worship, oblation.
